H0.text: Sleet and snow is the most likely type of weather to happen next when a summer day that begins with a clear, sunny sky later develops dark clouds in the afternoon.

H1.text: Rain and thunder is the most likely weather to happen next when a summer day that starts with a clear, sunny sky develops dark clouds in the afternoon.

H2.text: Wind and snow will most likely happen next after dark clouds form in the afternoon on a clear, sunny summer day.

H3.text: Fog and wind are the most likely weather to occur next when a summer day starts with a clear, sunny sky and then dark clouds form in the afternoon.
